name: Sicko Sanctum 2
description:
Speed, survival, action. Another berserk trot through codified hell, now with even faster pace. A sequel with development time under a twentieth of the original. Made with lessons learned, play as Martation as you survive as long as you can in the deepest depths of the Sicko Sanctum.

CONTROLS:

Left click: Ball Formator Ball (hits in a line)

Right click: Explode Ball (explodes on impact)

Left Shift or F: Sword (hits in range)

Health is ALWAYS depleting, to gain it back sword a melee enemy while it's down!

Bunny hopping is essential to gain speed!

The score is time.

Made originally for Score Jam 23. Assets for the sword and the Ball Formator + Ball were reused from Sicko Sanctum 1, everything else is original. 

Credits:

Design, programming, 3d models by Jake Stevenson.

Sfx, soundtrack by Sean Tarantella

Enemy Concepts, logo by Christain Kochanowski. 

Enemy Textures by Joey Arminio
